search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for OnePageCRM (onepage-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for OnePageCRM is [https://www.onepagecrm.com/pricing/](https://www.onepagecrm.com/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:
Are we a match? ![Image 1: Are we a match](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/heart-light.svg)

Simple pricing  
for **powerful CRM**
-------------------------------------

By subscribing to an Annual plan, you get 4 months for free.

More than 20 users? Let's talk!

21-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

Have a big team and need a flexible billing or assisted onboarding?

Compare plans
-------------

*   ### Contact Management
    
    Business
    
    Professional
    
    *   Unlimited contacts
        
        ![Image 2: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 3: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Import / export contacts
        
        ![Image 4: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 5: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Restore deleted contacts
        
        ![Image 6: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Have full control over your customer database and restore deleted information if needed.
        
        ![Image 7: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg) 30 Days
        
        ![Image 8: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg) 1 Day
        
    *   Unlimited tags and statuses
        
        ![Image 9: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Use your sales data more efficiently. Add custom tags and statuses to segment your database and quickly filter leads and customers.
        
        ![Image 10: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 11: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Unlimited Custom fields
        
        ![Image 12: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Add custom fields to contacts, organizations, and deals to capture and store the unique information relevant to your business.
        
        ![Image 13: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 14: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Mandatory Custom fields
        
        ![Image 15: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Make sure information is always recorded into your CRM account by enabling custom fields as Mandatory.
        
        ![Image 16: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 17: minuscircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/minuscircle.svg)
        
    *   Merge duplicate contacts
        
        ![Image 18: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Avoid duplicate entries and keep your sales data clean for better sales and contact management.
        
        ![Image 19: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 20: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Unlimited filters
        
        ![Image 21: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Slice and dice your sales data to pull up the information you need.
        
        ![Image 22: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 23: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Last activity filter
        
        ![Image 24: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Filter your contacts by last activity to easily search through your database.
        
        ![Image 25: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 26: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Contact prioritization
        
        ![Image 27: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Star contacts that are of high priority to add them to the Start filter accessible by all CRM users.
        
        ![Image 28: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 29: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   [Relationship management ![Image 30: opentab](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/opentab.svg)](https://www.onepagecrm.com/blog/contact-relationships-define-and-visualize-connections/)
        
        ![Image 31: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Define and visualize contact relationships (be it a co-signer, a business partner, a senior sales leader or anyone else).
        
        ![Image 32: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 33: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Merge Import
        
        ![Image 34: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Every contact in your CRM has a unique contact ID. Update existing contacts with new details and easily modify your data structure.
        
        ![Image 35: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 36: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   Documents area
        
        ![Image 37: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Keep all important documents accessible straight from within your CRM.
        
        ![Image 38: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 39: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
    *   File storage
        
        ![Image 40: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg) 20GB/user
        
        ![Image 41: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg) 10GB/user
        
    *   Print contact / download vCard
        
        ![Image 42: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)
        
        Use electronic business cards to quickly download and share contact information.
        
        ![Image 43: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)
        
        ![Image 44: checkcircle](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/checkcircle.svg)

    Professional

    Business

        ![Image 65: tooltip](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/tooltip.svg)

*   ### Sales Automation
    
    Business
    
    Professional

---------------------------------------------

Here are real stories why small businesses choose OnePageCRM among all other CRM systems.

FAQ about CRM pricing
---------------------

*   ### I live in the EU. Do these prices include VAT?
    
    Our prices do not include VAT. If you are in the EU, you will be charged VAT at the applicable rate for your member state unless you provide a valid VAT number.
    
*   ### What’s the difference between annual and monthly billing?
    
    With a monthly subscription, you'll pay for the CRM every month whereas with an annual subscription, you pay once a year. Besides, by subscribing to one of our annual plans, you'll get 4 months for free (compared to subscribing for a monthly plan for a year).
    
*   ### Is there a long-term contract?
    
    OnePageCRM is pay-as-you-go with no long-term contract. You can choose to cancel at any time directly from within your OnePageCRM account.
    
*   ### How do I get billed?
    
    Before your trial expires, you will be prompted to sign up to a monthly or yearly subscription. We will not charge you until your trial ends. Once subscribed, you will be charged monthly or yearly thereafter (depending on your preference), and we’ll email you a receipt every time your card is charged. You can also access all of your receipts from your OnePageCRM account. We accept Mastercard, Visa and American Express credit and debit cards.
    
*   ### Do you have any add-ons for extra fee?
    
    Nope, we have a very simple pricing structure. OnePageCRM has several unique apps developed specifically for our users, such as Web Forms, Lead Clipper, and Quick Quotes. All of these apps are free for OnePageCRM users and don't require any additional subscription.
    
*   ### Is my data safe?
    
    Yes. We take your privacy, security and back up very seriously. Your data is stored on a banking-level secure server with daily backup and 256-bit encrypted connection. You can export and delete your account at any stage.
    
*   ### What makes OnePageCRM different from all other CRMs?
    
    It's the only action-focused CRM in the world. Besides the usual A-to-Z database, you also get the Action Stream: it's a list of contacts sorted by the urgency of the follow-up reminder or task set next to them. This CRM is a powerful combination of a contact database and a productivity app.
    
*   ### Can I add other team members during the trial?
    
    Yes, you can add them on the Users and Billing Page of your account.
    
*   ### How do I contact support?
    
    Our Support Team is always happy to answer any questions you may have. General queries email: support@onepagecrm.com Billing related email: billing@onepagecrm.com
    

![Image 222: Left](https://www.onepagecrm.com/wp-content/themes/onepagecrm/assets/img/art_left.svg)
